attributes.action: pass a law which requires a member of the cabinet to be an elected MP and not a member of the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We currently have an unelected member of the cabinet wielding huge power and influence over the running of this country. Lord Mandelson is unelected and should not be allowed this level of influence. Lords can now be appointed by the Prime Minister and then made a member of the Cabinet. This is undemocratic and should no longer be tolerated

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
